attributes.description:
KIA SPORTAGE 2WD 1.6GDi AT IGNITE
Beautiful blue Sportage in fantastic condition. Full service history. Central locking, airbag, aircon, radio with bluetooth and USB. Power steering with controls on steering wheel. Height adjustable seats. Sensors to assist with parking. Automatic transmission and a smooth drive for you and your family. Visit your KIA Konfidence dealership in the Westrand, situated in Wilropark, Roodepoort and book this eye catcher for a test drive. Trade ins accepted. Nationwide delivery.

attributes.title: 2022 Kia Sportage 1.6 GDI Ignite Auto

attributes.description:
KIA CARNIVAL 2WD 2.2D AT 7S SXL
Absolutely stunning Carnival in black and in excellent condition. Full service history. Central locking, airbag, aircon, touch screen radio with bluetooth and USB ports. Height adjustable seats with memory. This eye catcher has two sunroofs, dual automatic sliding doors, power steering with controls on steering wheel. Reverse camera as well as bird's eye view while reversing and front/rear sensors to assist with parking. Various modes of driving to suit the driver. Electric windows and mirrors. Heating & cooling seats. Automatic transmission that allows for a smooth and comfortable drive for you and your family. Diesel fuel. Visit your KIA Konfidence dealership in the Westrand, situated in Wilropark, Roodepoort and book this beauty for a test drive. Nationwide delivery.
